Lines: Operation Odessa seems to be going smoothly overall.
DeepL_mtl: The Odessa operation seems to be going mostly smoothly.

Lines: Well, it would seem that they are having trouble
breakiing through in some places...
DeepL_mtl: Well, it looks like they are having a hard time attacking here....

Lines: Still, difference in numbers is obvious.
Give it one more day and we'll push through.
DeepL_mtl: But the difference in quantity is not obvious.
One more day and we can push through.

Lines: And thus we are tasked with escorting reserve
troops for final push.
DeepL_mtl: And so we escort the rear reserve force to make that final push.

Lines: It seems that top brass finally recognized by skill.
You guys aren't that bad, but you'll still fall behind
if you dont show off your skills more.
DeepL_mtl: I see that the upper management has finally recognized my ability.
You guys aren't bad at this, so you're going to lose out if you don't show off your skills perfectly.

Lines: Heh...our Lilly`s still as ambitious as ever.
Jaburo and other bases keep inviting me, but I like this team.
I'll do my part as before.
DeepL_mtl: Huh..., Mr. Lil is as ambitious as ever.
I'm still getting invitations from Jabro and other places, but I like this team.
I'll do my best as always.'

Lines: Ja...Jaburo's asking for you?!
Hmmmm... you're doing quite well, Hoa.
DeepL_mtl: Ja...I'm invited from Jaburo....
Hmmm...Hoa's doeing pretty well.

Lines: Oh. You received invitation the other day, right Captain?
Why have you not accepted it?
DeepL_mtl: Well, didn't the captain get an invitation the other day? Why don't you take it?

Lines: Ohh, you're quite informed, Dennis, but I like Earth.
It's from MS team belonging to Phoebe, which will head to space.
I am not so good with that vomity feeling when weightless.
DeepL_mtl: Dennis is indeed a well-informed person.
But I like the earth.
With the Phoebe-affiliated MS corps, they would have to go up into space.
I'm not good at it...................................the weightless puking feeling.

Lines: What?! Isn't Phoebe...
a flagship General Reville will embark on?!
How can you reject such ofer?!
DeepL_mtl: What?　Phoebe is...not the flagship of the main fleet that General Reville is scheduled to embark on! Oh, you!　What are you saying no to!

Lines: You're not good at puking...
Do something about that puking ersonality of yours first!!
Are you an idiot?! Hahahaha...
DeepL_mtl: You're not good at "pukka"...do something about that pukka personality of yours first! You're not a pukka!　Hahahahaha....

Lines: Hey, hey, chill down Lilly.
Its still a secret that Phoebe will be a flagship
so don't go around yelling that out loud...
DeepL_mtl: Well, well, well, Lil' girl.
Calm down.
Phoebe's plans for the flagship are incredibly important and confidential, so don't say it out loud like that....

_: should this be in lighter or harsher tone? check the voice
Lines: Also, remember that I am your captain
so don't insult me like that.
DeepL_mtl: Also.
In case you don't know, I'm the captain, so don't call me "anta" or "idiot.

Lines: Hahaha... everyone in this unit is so well informed
Oh my, I'm in trouble...
DeepL_mtl: Hahaha...
I don't know why everyone in this unit is so well informed.
Oh, my God, I'm in trouble.

Lines: Lil. This is definitely going to be  great team, so please
have a little patience. Its not goof to be in such a hurry.
Calm and steady wins the rae, right?
DeepL_mtl: Lil.
This team is definitely going to be great, so please be patient a little longer.
It's not good to be in too much of a hurry.
Calm, steady, steady, steady... right?

Lines: さて、では、我隊の輝ける歴史に、また1つ大戦果を加えるべく、
そろそろ出撃しよう！
DeepL_mtl: Well, then, it's time to go off to add another great achievement to our unit's glorious history!

Lines: Roger that!
DeepL_mtl: Roger that!
